package_description: Mails anomalies in the system logfiles to the administrator
package_longDescription:
Mails anomalies in the system logfiles to the administrator.

Logcheck helps spot problems and security violations in your logfiles automatically and will send the results to you by e-mail. Logcheck was part of the Abacus Project of security tools, but this version has been rewritten.
